Class notifications

java.lang.Object
com.notifications.system_tray_notifications.basics.notifications
public class notifications extends Object
The notifications class represents a system tray notification configuration. It includes properties such as the application title, icon path, alarm title, alarm message, notification duration, and whether the notification repeats.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

  • Constructor Details

    • notifications

      public notifications(String AppTitle, String IconPath, String AlarmTitle, String AlarmMessage, int duration, boolean isRepeating)
      Constructs a new notifications object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      AppTitle - The title of the application sending the notification.
      IconPath - The file path to the notification icon.
      AlarmTitle - The title of the alarm/notification.
      AlarmMessage - The message content of the alarm/notification.
      duration - The duration (in seconds) the notification will be displayed.
      isRepeating - A flag indicating whether the notification should repeat.
